abstract: A banking analyst with  JPMorgan Chase suggests that Credit Suisse and UBS get together and combine their investment banks in a joint venture.
snippet: A banking analyst with  JPMorgan Chase suggests that Credit Suisse and UBS get together and combine their investment banks in a joint venture.
lead_paragraph: Everyone knows two wrongs don’t make a right, but one banking analyst, Kian Abouhossein of JPMorgan Chase, thinks that two less-than-perfect investment banks could make a compelling whole.

headline.main: Would a Swiss Bank Mash-Up Work?
